BoringSec

Corporate Penetration Testing with BeEF

Presented on October 25 2013 at SMAU Milano.

This talk (in Italian) introduced The Browser Exploitation Framework (BeEF) and some of its most interesting modules. Focused on social engineering, the presentation demonstrated the effectiveness of BeEF during a penetration test.

Get the slides on Speaker Deck or watch them below.
